fields.description: The specific sub-set of scan bom entry representations requested
The type of import event represented
The component name provided by the import report
The component version name provided by the import report
The license name imported from Protex, if provided
The name of the component matched during import
The name of the component version matched during import
The external ID used for matching
The reason a matching failure occurred, if applicable
Meta data associated with the representation, as described in <<metadata,Meta Data>>
The total number of elements available in the result set

links.description: Resource representing the count of each event type associated with the graph
